media:group.media:title: anarchy rainbow dance study
media:group.media:description:
i got splatoon 3 recently and i rly like it !!! i want to be the drippiest squid ever but i am always broke in this game
this song has been stuck in my head the past few weeks so i took a bit of time to make an animation study on its choreography! the song is anarchy rainbow from splatoon 3
thinking of posting an update video soon abt other things to come:) in case u guys might have any questions let me know!
hope u guys have been well!! üåû
--- twitter: https://twitter.com/_yapsharlene ig: https://instagram.com/_yapsharlene ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/shar merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/shar

media:group.media:title: of the wild
media:group.media:description:
one of these days ill post something longer than 5 seconds i swear HAHA hope ure all doing good !! :)
i also want to know if u guys are ok with me uploading things this short from time to time !! i'm always not super sure whether to upload rly short animations like this and i end up kinda just slapping them on twt/ig exclusively :( feel free to lemme know ur thoughts!!
--- twitter: https://twitter.com/_yapsharlene ig: https://instagram.com/_yapsharlene ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/shar merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/shar

media:group.media:title: peace n quiet
media:group.media:description:
hi !! been a while!!!
these past couple of months i was able to finish my lab thesis and my full-time internship as a developer!! i learned a lot and i'm continuing my work there, but as part-time so i can still have to time to get into animating again!!:)
hope u've all been good!! have a great day today hehe (also it is my birthday 2day !!! happy 2 have been born)
--- twitter: https://twitter.com/_yapsharlene ig: https://instagram.com/_yapsharlene ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/shar merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/shar

media:group.media:title: [Honkai Impact 3rd] Idol Ai-chan's Retired Life #HonkaiCarnival2022
media:group.media:description:
ai-chan u will always be the best idol to me..!! ü•¨
a short for #HonkaiCarnival2022 !! happy honkai day!! ‚Ä¢ÃÄ.Ã´‚Ä¢ÃÅ‚úß üéà
i learned a lot while animating this, thinking of sharing more about the process (especially for coloring, because i learned a lot of shortcuts on animate to help with the whole thing)!
credits for the music and voice acting go to these lovely people!!
Music: Axl Lee HOYO-MiX
Voice Acting: Sai as Ai-chan https://www.youtube.com/c/Saicecream
TomatoVA as the shop owner https://www.youtube.com/c/TomatoVA

media:group.media:description:
one of my favorite genshin cn livestream clips!! super cute..
clip source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l15Fc5MCX5A original livestream: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1xg411G7i2
i also accidentaly animated this on 30fps and i only realized when i finished all the line art (ah.............)
